name: macos-migrator
title: macOS Migrator
description: Saves all of your macos settings so you can reapply when you get a new machine.
author: nbbaier

commands.name: save-settings
commands.title: Save Settings
commands.description: Save all of your macos settings on the current machine.

commands.name: apply-settings
commands.title: Apply Settings
commands.description: Apply all of your macos settings to the current machine.

preferences.name: exportPath
preferences.title: Export Directory
preferences.description: Optional: Default location to export settings backup

preferences.name: includePackages
preferences.title: Include Package Lists
preferences.description: Save Homebrew and npm package lists (applying will install packages)
preferences.label: Include packages

preferences.name: autoBackup
preferences.title: Auto-backup Before Apply
preferences.description: Automatically create a backup before applying settings
preferences.label: Auto-backup

preferences.name: customDotfiles
preferences.title: Custom Dotfiles
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of additional dotfiles to include (e.g., .tmux.conf,.config/nvim/init.vim)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
